column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Marie - Thanks for the 5-star review! We greatly appreciate your kind words and the bird's-eye view of a nearly decimated plate of Crispy Shrimp Balls. I'm glad you enjoyed your stay. But perhaps most importantly
column2: I appreciate your understanding on the wait times. On busy nights
column3: we try our best to move things along as quickly
column5: as we can. These nights are never easy for our front OR back of house
column6: so I'm always glad to know the quality of our food is valued as such. We look forward to seeing you again soon!
